channel.title: stack on IdaHerty's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in stack on IdaHerty's Blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: How I created this post: First install hugo on your system Choose a folder to run this command 1 hugo new site blog cd into your site folder, init a git repo, and add a theme. The theme I used is called Stack. 1 2 3 4 cd blog git init git clone https://github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack/ themes/hugo-theme-stack git submodule add https://github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack/ themes/hugo-theme-stack Delete config.toml. Copy the config.yaml file in exampleSite/ folder 1 2 rm config.
